title: Task-Based Online English Listening Education: Applying the OTIL Model for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English listening proficiency and foundational pedagogical knowledge
context.additional_context: Aims to cultivate advanced English listening skills required for academic presentations and research collaboration among prospective science teachers. Task-based interactive learning utilizing personal devices (BYOD) in a blended environment

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend spoken English materials in various scientific domains (academic presentations, interviews, discussions) with over 80% comprehension.
Learners can enhance listening strategies by engaging in at least three peer evaluations and feedback sessions using online collaboration tools (discussion forums, real-time chat).
Learners demonstrate over 20% improvement in listening proficiency (pre- vs. post-assessment comparison) through weekly assignments and peer reviews.

resources: Science Field English Listening Material Database
Real-Time Video Conferencing Tools (Zoom, MS Teams)
Automatic Speech Recognition Assessment Tool (e.g., Speechling)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
